New Show

How to watch 'Life Drawing Live' this Saturday Link: https://www.sbs.com.au/guide/article/2020/06/15/how-watch-life-drawing-live

Abstract

Join in as we draw the nation together for a live two-hour life drawing class. Here's all the ways you can watch the live show, and draw along at home.
